Desc.entry: A voluntary organisation which provides housing-related support for tenants and owner-occupiers living in the Burngreave area of Sheffield. Offers a range of practical support and advice to families and individuals who may need help in maintaining their tenancies or those at risk of losing their home. Support provided includes: moving into a property, claiming benefits, budgeting and accessing other relevant agencies and organisations. The service is available for up to 2 years, by which time the service user will have developed the necesssary skills and confidence to maintain their home independently. Self or any referral.
